data.name: Robotry! Demo
data.detailed_description:
Create chaos with physics in this demo of Robotry!

The demo will be available for a limited time starting June 13th 2022!
data.about_the_game:
Create chaos with physics in this demo of Robotry!

The demo will be available for a limited time starting June 13th 2022!
data.short_description: A physics-based platformer without a jump button. Walk, jump, climb and parkour by directly controlling each leg of a confused baby robot. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, or tackle your friends in multiplayer versus modes!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVIDIA or AMD graphics card, Intel HD graphics 4000 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or newer
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
